text:
Blk157,Mei Ling Road
26/8/2023 around 1700 i had went to minimart wanted to buy four packets of salt and declare is 4 dollars because  im usually customer who runs a business near by on the same time i had ask the cashier about the price as usually i bought for 55cent per packet but now is 1 dollar per packet and he said that i have to refer with manager I went to double check with the prices but surprised that she used terrible tone , words such as "Don't Come back to buy stuff at here she don't want to do my business. As a manager with bad attitude really disappointed. At the same time i need to thanks for one of your staff went to find me and explain that the brand are difference so that price. I had accepted with his explain its just a easy job but why cant she do it ?
Hopefully  your company will take action on this matter and waiting for your reply .
Wide range of affordable products! Highly recommend!
